lead_paragraph: Closing in on 3,000 hits, Ichiro Suzuki isn't inclined to stop there. He's 42, and for some time has said — in Japanese and English — he wants to play until at least 50.

headline.print_headline: Closing In on 3,000 Hits, Suzuki Is on the Upswing at Age 42
headline.main: Closing In on 3,000 Hits, Suzuki Is on the Upswing at Age 42

snippet: Closing in on 3,000 hits, Ichiro Suzuki isn't inclined to stop there. He's 42, and for some time has said — in Japanese and English — he wants to play until at least 50....
